function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid shift to digital technology in architecture education","Impact":"Risk of inadequate training and support leading to suboptimal use of digital tools","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training and support for instructors and students, establish best practices for digital tools in education","Technologies":"Digital collaboration platforms, online learning management systems","People":"Instructors, students","Owner":"Educational institutions"},{"Description":"Globalization of design studios and classes","Impact":"Risk of cultural and regulatory challenges in globalized teaching environments","Mitigation":"Develop cross-cultural communication training for instructors and students, ensure compliance with international education regulations","Technologies":"Online communication tools, cross-cultural training programs","People":"Instructors, students, international regulatory bodies","Owner":"Educational institutions, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Use of different computing technologies in future cities","Impact":"Risk of data inconsistency and processing inefficiency","Mitigation":"Establish standardized data formats and protocols, invest in real-time computing infrastructure","Technologies":"Real-time computing technologies, standardized data formats","People":"Urban planners, data analysts","Owner":"City planning authorities"}]}
